job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Sanas is building a world-first, real-time accent conversion platform. We have developed a solution with the help of the minds behind Shazam, Siri, and Nuance. Our first deployment horizon is centered on customer service centers to increase customer satisfaction and decrease average-handling time, training costs, and turnover. With our solution, accent conversion can be done in real-time, resulting in increased understanding and decreased customer service costs.&nbsp;We are a 15-person company founded in 2020. We have already signed contracts worth tens of millions of dollars and are backed by Human Capital, General Catalyst, Quiet Capital, and DN Capital.&nbsp;With all the growth, we are looking for someone to join our machine learning R&D team. The role will involve close work with the top cited Machine Learning Researchers in the voice conversion space as well as access to massive speech datasets.&nbsp;Must have  - BS or MS in computer science, engineering, or other technical degrees   
  - Have 1+ years of industry experience or 3+ years of research experience   
  - Have experience working in an industry relevant to Speech and Language   
  - You are familiar with Pytorch, Tensorflow, Bash   
&nbsp;Nice to have  - Comfortable communicating information to executive and senior stakeholders   
  - Excited to work in a fast-paced environment   
  - Passionate about their work, take ownership, and deliver results   
  - You proactively identify problems and opportunities and generate creative approaches to solve them   
  - You understand that celebrating accomplishments is just as important as looking for ways to improve
